title: Deploy application to Internet Computer mainnet

requirements.text: Deploy the application to the Internet Computer mainnet so it is publicly accessible with a permanent canister URL that can be shared with customers

quotes: Please give me my website link so that I can share to my customers

acceptanceCriteria: Application is deployed to Internet Computer mainnet (not local replica)
A permanent canister URL is generated in the format https://[canister-id].icp0.io or https://[canister-id].raw.icp0.io
The URL is publicly accessible and can be shared with customers
All existing features function correctly on mainnet including customer submission form, pricing information, contact page, and authenticated admin dashboard
Internet Identity authentication works on mainnet for admin dashboard access
Customer submissions are persisted on mainnet storage

constraints: Must deploy to Internet Computer mainnet, not local development environment
Must preserve all existing functionality including Internet Identity authentication
Must not modify any application code - this is purely a deployment request
nonGoals: Making any code changes or adding new features
Modifying the application logic or user interface
Changing authentication or data storage mechanisms
